text: Shinko suru mono yo, anata gata ni wa satsugai ni taisuru hofuku ga sadame rareta. Jiyujin ni wa jiyujin, dorei ni wa dorei, fujin ni wa fujin to. Daga kare (kagai-sha) ni,(higaisha no) kyodai kara keigen no moshide ga atta baai wa,(kagai-sha wa) seii o motte teicho ni bensho shi nasai. Kore wa anata gata e no nushi kara no (hofuku no) kanwadeari, jihidearu. Sorede kongo kore ni ihan suru mono wa, itamashi chobatsu o ukerudearou
